comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20111008085652

Steps to reproduce:

Pressed F11 to place first Firefox window in fullscreen on first  monitor, switched focus to Firefox window on second monitor, then attempted to switch focus to other application on second monitor.

Using Kubuntu 11.10 64 bit.


Actual results:

Firefox on second monitor stayed on top of other application.


Expected results:

Other application should have gotten focus/appeared on top of second Firefox window.
